short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for revolutionizing your outreach on LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you spending hours on LinkedIn inviting and messaging users in hope of turning them into paying customers?

Automate your tasks with Selliplus LinkedIn Assistant and get 10x more responses in a week!

How?
1. Download Selliplus extension ⬇️
2. Import profiles from LinkedIn or Sales Navigator search 🔍
3. Adjust Campaign sequence to best fit your needs. Personalize invites and messages 📩
4. Start campaign and watch Selliplus do the job for you 💪

Why Selliplus?
- Safest tool on the market: No need to provide your LinkedIn credentials, daily limits and mechanisms safeguarding your account. 🔒
- Customizable sequences. You don't need separate campaigns for invites, messages, follows, endorsments. You can do it in one campaign! 🚀
- Personalized messages - mention your prospect's name, surname, company or position in the messages 📩
- Advanced prospects management: Filter prospects, export them to csv, enroll in new campaigns 📈

For more information visit https://selliplus.com/
